item.title: RNAseq三个差异组比较分析
item.author: 作者
item.description: 使用volcano3D进行三个差异组间的可视化分析 概述 The volcano3D package enables exploration of probes differentially expressed between three groups. Its main purpose is for the visualisation of differentially expressed genes in a three-dimensional volcano plot. These plots can be converted to interactive visualisations using plotly.
